official_title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Conservation and Production Act to make Puerto Rico eligible for the weatherization assistance program.

titles.title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico.
